title: Following Recommendations from the Internet...
description:
Use Code "GLASS" to get $5 off for your first #Sakuraco box through this link: https://team.sakura.co/glassreflection-SC2208 and #TokyoTreat box through this link: https://team.tokyotreat.com/glassreflection-TT2208

I have found myself slightly behind on the new shows of the season, so I decided to look towards places on the internet to see what original shows they were recommending, and how good those recommendations are...

Where I searched:
► MyAnimeList: https://myanimelist.net/anime/season
► IGN: https://www.ign.com/articles/best-new-anime-to-watch-summer-season-2022
► Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/anime/
► Anitrendz: https://anitrendz.com/charts/top-anime

► Support me on Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/Arkada
► Follow me on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/GlassReflection
